attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish to register our support for EQUAL RECOGNTION for ALL the civilian heroes of the Glasgow Airport Terror Attack in June 2007.
They all played their part in preventing the terrorists from carrying out their atrocities, and they should all be awarded for their brave and gallant actions.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "award civilians, Alex McIlveen, Michael Kerr and Stephen Clarkson, the Queens Gallantry Medal for Bravery for their role in helping to thwart the terror attack on Glasgow Airport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15659.asp
